content.title: Bicycle Scheme- Haryana Labour Welfare Board
content.beneficiary: Workers registered under the Haryana Labour Welfare Board
content.details: The scheme aims to provide benefits to workers registered under the Haryana Labour Welfare Board through a structured application process.
benefits: Support for transportation needs of workers
eligibility: Must be a registered worker under the Haryana Labour Welfare Board
Must possess a Parivar Pehchan Patra (PPP) Family ID
content.application_process: Online application through the Labour Department Haryana website and Antyodaya-SARAL Portal.
